titleInfo.title: Data publication: Eigenvalue spectra of QCD and the fate of $U_A(1)$ breaking towards the chiral limit

mods.abstract:
Data publication for "Eigenvalue spectra of QCD and the fate of U_A(1) breaking towards the chiral limit",
[arXiv:2102.06136](https://arxiv.org/abs/2102.06136). Contains plot scripts and data shown in figures.
